alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Marion; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 9:15AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Searcy, northeastern Newton, southwestern Marion and southern Boone Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 915 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pruitt, or near Harrison, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harrison... Western Grove... Pyatt... Valley Springs... Dugger... Olvey... Crawford... Bellefonte... Everton... Marble Falls... Gaither... Eros... Bruno... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Marion; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations
